ocremixupdater
Class Downloader

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      ocremixupdater.Downloader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class Downloader
extends javax.swing.JDialog

The window that shows the download progress, either for list pages or mp3s.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

public Downloader(java.awt.Frame parent,

Creates new form Downloader

Method Detail

setUpToDownloadList

public void setUpToDownloadList(ReMixDatabase data,
                                int minIndex)
Set up the window to download the list of ReMixes.

Parameters:
data - The database.
minIndex - The lowest OCR number to download; that is, when the program sees a ReMix with this number, it doesn't download any more list files.

setUpToDownloadMP3s

public void setUpToDownloadMP3s(ReMixDatabase data)
Set up the window to download the mp3s in the database that are marked as "get".

Parameters:
data - The database.

getOutputText

public java.lang.String getOutputText()
Get the contents of the output text box.

Returns:
txtOutput.getText()

setOutputText

public void setOutputText(java.lang.String t)
Set (not append) the text in the output text box to the given text, and move the cursor to the end.

Parameters:
t - The text to display.

writeOutput

public void writeOutput(java.lang.String opt)
Write the given text to the end of the output text box as a new line, and set the cursor to the end.

Parameters:
opt - The text to append. Newline automatically added.

clearOutput

public void clearOutput()
Sets the text in the output text box to "".

unOutput

public void unOutput()
Deletes the last line of output.

receiveStop

public void receiveStop()
Call this function after the downloading thread has finished.
